actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to U.S. involvement in the Middle East crisis.

summary.text: States that it is the sense of the House of Representatives that no United States combat troops be introduced, committed, or involved in any way or manner, directly or indirectly, in the present armed conflict in the Middle East without prior congressional authorization.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to U.S. involvement in the Middle East crisis.
